alert.note: Alert for Albemarle; Culpeper; Greene; Madison; Nelson; Orange; Rappahannock (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 16 at 5:31PM EST until January 17 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow changing to ice. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch are expected. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central, northern and northwest Virginia. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 7 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Albemarle; Culpeper; Greene; Madison; Nelson; Orange; Rappahannock
